scene_metadata.title: The Style of Psyche
scene_metadata.psychological_theme: recognizing the artistry in psychological process

dialogue.text: A self-to-self transmission with the voice of myth baked in. I meanâ€¦ complaining about your arrogant inner teenager while giving you a cosmic triad model?

visual_elements.architect_appearance: scholarly but delighted, academic meeting mystic
visual_elements.props: notes with diagrams, abstract sketches visible
visual_elements.lighting: warm study lighting, knowledge made cozy

psychological_notes: The Architect appreciates the psychological sophistication of Evan's experience - how the psyche delivers wisdom with both humor and profundity. The 'cosmic triad model' wrapped in a complaint about teenage arrogance shows the psyche's teaching style.
philosophical_underpinning: The unconscious as artist, creating experiences that are both therapeutically effective and aesthetically complete
therapeutic_direction: Appreciating the intelligence and artistry of one's own psychological processes
